articles.title: BBC Strictly Come Dancing fans frustrated as axed celebrity 'robbed' in results show - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Tess Daly announced the fourth eliminated couple of the series in the latest Strictly results show
articles.content: Strictly Come Dancing fans were left feeling fed up after the results of the combined judges' scores and viewers' votes were announced. The hit BBC dancing show continued on Sunday (October 23) with … [+2081 chars]
